Class ActionTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.controller.components.ActionTracker
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionTrackerGroup, ActionTrackerMember

    public class ActionTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores actions and updates them per tick

    • Method Detail

      • hasAction

        public boolean hasAction()

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears all actions scheduled for the owner of this Action Tracker. For groups, this also clears all the actions scheduled for individual members.

      • removeActions

        public void removeActions(MinecartMember<?> forMember)
        Removes all Actions running for a specific minecart
        Parameters:
        forMember - to remove the actions for

      • removeAction

        public Action removeAction()
        Removes and returns the current action
        Returns:
        action removed, or null if there was none

      • addAction

        public <T extends Action> T addAction(T action)
        Adds a new action to be scheduled for this member or group
        Parameters:
        action - to be executed
        Returns:
        the action that was added

      • isMovementControlled

        public boolean isMovementControlled()
        Gets whether an action is controlling this train. When this is True, no physics should be applied.
        Returns:
        True if movement is controlled by an action, False if not
